channel.title: How to make my client publish
channel.description: um well i have my own client like in a folder but how do i put it in like mega something.com or what ever website people use to download the server i want to put mine in one of them how do i do that so people can download my server

item.title: How to make my client publish

item.description:

up2share!! no wait to download on Up2share…

item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

I’d suggest putting all the class files and what you need to run it into a .zip file and load it up to megaupload.com.

item.description:

zip it up… put it on up2share.net and put the link in your siggy and put a Link in your server telling poeple where to go for your client
